game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.synopsis: In a world where magic and technology coexist, you play as a skilled archaeologist tasked with uncovering the secrets of the ancient city of Eldarath. The city has been hidden for centuries, and its rediscovery sparks a global interest in unlocking its powerful artifacts.
game.beginning: The game begins on a dusty research vessel, where you've received a cryptic map that supposedly leads to Eldarath. As you set foot on the vessel's makeshift laboratory, you're greeted by your trusted assistant, Dr. Patel, who reveals she's cracked the encryption on the ancient language.
game.ending: With every artifact you uncover, you unravel the mysteries of Eldarath's downfall and face off against a powerful cult seeking to exploit its magic for their own gain. Ultimately, you must decide how to use your discoveries—unleashing them upon the world or containing them forever. The fate of civilization hangs in the balance.
